meta.title: About Us - @:company
meta.description: Learn more about our company, history, mission and values of @:company

about.title: About Our Company
about.description: @:company is a reliable partner in construction with years of experience and impeccable reputation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide high-quality construction services that exceed client expectations and contribute to Ukraine's infrastructure development.

values.title: Our Values
values.quality_descr: We strive for the highest quality standards in every project, using modern technologies and materials.
values.reliability_descr: Reliability is the foundation of our business. We always keep up with deadlines and fulfill our commitments.
values.innovation_descr: We constantly implement innovative solutions and modern technologies to increase work efficiency.
values.safety_descr: Occupational safety is our priority. We strictly adhere to all safety regulations and rules.

team.title: Our team
team.description-1: Over 20 years of experience in the construction industry. Manages the strategic development of the company.
team.description-2: Responsible for the technical part of projects and quality control of work performance.
team.description-3: Coordinates project implementation and interaction with clients at all stages of construction.

meta.title: Services - @:company
meta.description: Full range of construction services: industrial construction, plumbing and electrical work

services.title: Our Services

industrial.title: Industrial construction
industrial.description: Construction of industrial facilities, warehouses, production facilities

plumbing.title: Plumbing work
plumbing.description: Installation and maintenance of plumbing systems

electrical.title: Electrical installation work
electrical.description: Electrical installation work and maintenance of electrical systems

services.subtitle: We provide a full range of construction services for industrial and commercial facilities

additional.title: Additional services
additional.card-description-1: Development of project documentation in accordance with state standards and customer requirements.
additional.card-description-2: Professional advice on construction, selection of materials and technologies.
additional.card-description-3: Quality control of work performance and compliance with technological processes.
additional.card-description-4: 24/7 emergency response service to address unforeseen situations.
additional.card-description-5: Full warranty and post-warranty service of the work performed.
additional.card-description-6: Preparation of detailed estimates and calculations of the cost of work.

step-1.title: Advice
step-1.description: Free consultation and assessment of the object. Discussion of your needs and wishes.

step-2.title: Designing
step-2.description: Development of technical specifications and design documentation taking into account all requirements.

step-3.title: Contract
step-3.description: Conclusion of a contract with a detailed description of the work, terms and cost of the project.

step-4.title: Implementation
step-4.description: Professional performance of work in compliance with all technologies and quality standards.

step-5.title: Facility handover
step-5.description: Delivery of a finished object with a full package of documents and warranty obligations.
